name: tab-selector
title: tab-selector
description: log open tabs to file and allows to change active tab by its number
author: Massimiliano Brocchini

preferences.name: pref_shortcut
preferences.title: shortcut
preferences.description: keyboard shortcut to activate tab selection text input

preferences.name: pref_path
preferences.title: path
preferences.description:
full path of the directory that will store the file contaning the list of open tabs
NOTE: must end with directory separator
